name: opencode-reflection-plugin
description: OpenCode plugin that implements a reflection/judge layer to verify task completion

scripts.install:global: mkdir -p ~/.config/opencode/plugin/lib && cp reflection.ts worktree.ts ~/.config/opencode/plugin/ && sed 's|from "./telegram.js"|from "./lib/telegram.js"|g' tts.ts > ~/.config/opencode/plugin/tts.ts && cp telegram.ts ~/.config/opencode/plugin/lib/ && node scripts/ensure-deps.js && cd ~/.config/opencode && bun install
scripts.eval:judge: cd evals && npx promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.yaml
scripts.eval:stuck: cd evals && npx promptfoo eval -c stuck-detection.yaml
scripts.eval:compression: cd evals && npx promptfoo eval -c post-compression.yaml
scripts.eval:agent: cd evals && npx promptfoo eval -c agent-evaluation.yaml
